title: Gridscape
description: Gridscape is an infinite spatial knowledge engine for mapping complex ideas. Start with any topic and generate non-linear research nodes. Draw frames on the canvas to synthesize new conceptual artifacts.

title: Worldwide
description: Worldwide is a tactical geolocation game that challenges operatives to decipher AI-generated cultural and historical intelligence to identify secret countries on an interactive map. It features a Joint Operations mode where agents can synchronize in real-time lobbies to compete or collaborate via a secure, live tactical feed.

title: Flickbook
description: Your streaming history, beautifully stamped. Flickbook generates unique visa-style stamps for each show and movie you've watched.

title: Elemental
description: Elemental is an interactive, high-aesthetic periodic table application that utilizes the Gemini API to intelligently highlight relevant chemical elements based on natural language scientific queries.

title: Stemwise
description: Write your daily reflection and AI finds a plant that matches your emotional state. Over time, your thoughts become a garden you can walk through.
